attributes.action: make sure that the proposal to introduce the 'International Round' in the Premier League
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Premier League has today revealed that they are willing to explore the possibility of introducing an extra round of games in the premier league to be played at various venues around the world. 

The idea is fundamentally flawed and is simply a commercially driven exercise to make more and more money. 

This change would definatly cause a massive disruption as some teams will almost certainly gain an advantage over another depending on who they draw in this extra round.

Relegations, european places and ultimately the destination of the title is going to be decided by the luck of the draw.

Quite simply, this cannot be allowed to happen.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
